50.$description: UI status: success (light). Used for backgrounds and subtle surfaces. Generated from anchor 500 using OKLCH tonal scale.

100.$description: UI status: success (light). Used for backgrounds and subtle surfaces. Generated from anchor 500 using OKLCH tonal scale.

500.$description: UI status: success (anchor). Used for general success feedback (alerts, notifications, form validation). Separate from application-specific status colors.

600.$description: UI status: success (dark). Used for text, icons, and borders. Generated from anchor 500 using OKLCH tonal scale.

700.$description: UI status: success (dark). Used for text, icons, and borders. Generated from anchor 500 using OKLCH tonal scale.
